Name: Beachcomber's Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: BLEND all ingredients with one 6oz scoop crushed ice and serve with straws.
History: Created by Ernest Raymond Beaumont-Gantt, A.K.A. Don The Beachcomber at his bar in Hollywood, California, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Beachcomber's Daiquiri contains 222 calories
